name: RI_1_1_9_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Receive_Retain_Event
title: RI.1.1.9.1 Evidence of Record Entry Receive/Retain Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Receive/Retain Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Receive/Retain Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.9.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when externally-sourced Record Entry content is received and retained.

statement.label: RI.1.1.9.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization transmitting Record Entry content received and retained.

statement.label: RI.1.1.9.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization receiving transmitted Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.9.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the patient who is subject of received Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.9.1#05
statement.requirement: IF the system supports user verification of receipt of externally-sourced Record Entry content, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user accepting receipt of the transmitted Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.9.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application which transmitted Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.9.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application which received Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.9.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., receive).

statement.label: RI.1.1.9.1#09
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time Record Entry content is received.

statement.label: RI.1.1.9.1#10
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) where the Record Entry content is received.

statement.label: RI.1.1.9.1#11
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the rationale for accepting receipt of transmitted Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.9.1#12
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the type of Record Entry content received (e.g., original, amended, updated data).

statement.label: RI.1.1.9.1#13
statement.requirement: IF an internal identifier is assigned to data/documents received from an external source, THEN the system MAY capture the data, document or other identifier for the Record Entry received.

statement.label: RI.1.1.9.1#14
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture data elements for the Record Entry received.
